name: Tactiq - AI note taker for Google Meet, Zoom and MS Teams
summary: Meeting transcription extension with invasive WebRTC hooking that patches native RTCPeerConnection on Google Meet, Zoom, and MS Teams. Intercepts XHR/fetch on Google Meet for session data. Extensive analytics via Mixpanel and Datadog. Can capture tab screenshots.

vulnerabilities.title: RTCPeerConnection Hooking
vulnerabilities.description: Overrides native window.RTCPeerConnection API on Google Meet, Zoom, and MS Teams to intercept WebRTC data channels containing captions and transcripts.

vulnerabilities.title: XHR/Fetch Interception on Google Meet
vulnerabilities.description: Intercepts network requests on Google Meet to extract session IDs and language settings.

flags.description: Intercepts XHR/fetch on Google Meet for session data extraction
Captures meeting transcripts via WebRTC hooking and sends to Tactiq servers
